name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clifton PALMER, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 506
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clifton PALMER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 13, 1980.
Decided Jan. 30, 1981.
Roland J. Atkins, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
